text: 21:7 He who overcomes will inherit these things ¦ I will give these things to him who overcomes K BYZ HF ¦ He who overcomes will inherit all things TR ¦ These things will belong to him who overcomes ANTHe who overcomes will inherit these things; I will be his God, and 21:7 he will be my son ¦ they will be my sons Ανhe will be my son.
